description: A candy manufacturing facility on Fish-Man Island that is destroyed by Daruma during the New Fish-Man Pirates' rampage.

keyEvents.title: Daruma Chews Through the Candy Factory
keyEvents.description: Daruma uses his powerful burrowing abilities and jaw strength to chew through the Candy Factory.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Daruma's destructive eating abilities and the New Fish-Man Pirates' willingness to destroy their own island.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed by Daruma during the New Fish-Man Pirates' attack
Chewed through and destroyed by Daruma

description: The main plaza of Fish-Man Island where Hody Jones holds King Neptune captive and demonstrates his Energy Steroid transformation.

keyEvents.title: Hody Jones Overdoses on Energy Steroids
keyEvents.description: At Gyoncorde Plaza, Hody Jones consumes more Energy Steroids and undergoes his monstrous transformation.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Hody reveals his most powerful form and terrorizes the Fish-Man Island citizens.

keyEvents.title: Hody Demonstrates His Enhanced Power
keyEvents.description: Hody uses a devastating water shot attack at the plaza, leveling the entire area and shocking the witnesses.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scope of destruction Hody can cause at the heart of Fish-Man Island.

statusHistory.reason: Main battleground during Fish-Man Island conflict
